name: natural
description:
The natural command extracts natural features from OSM data. Categories include:

- Landform: peaks, hills, cliffs, caves, rocks
- Vegetation: woods, trees, scrub, grassland
- Water: springs, hot springs, geysers, wetlands
- Coastal: beaches, coastlines, capes, peninsulas

Includes elevation data for peaks and other features.

options.-t, --type: Filter by natural type (e.g., peak, beach)
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: landform, vegetation, water, coastal
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Natural features with:
- natural: Feature type
- name: Feature name
- elevation: Height in meters (for peaks)
- Geometry: Point, LineString, or Polygon
